mapper.select: select employee_id,name as value from employee where is_deleted = 0 and airport_code = #{airportCode}

select e.employee_id,e.`name` as `value` from employee e
RIGHT JOIN sys_user_role r ON e.employee_id = r.user_id
where e.is_deleted = 0 and e.airport_code = #{airportCode}
AND r.role_id = #{roleId} and r.is_deleted=0
AND e.name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY e.`name`
mapper.update: update sys_user_role set is_deleted = 1 where role_id not in (${roleIds}) and airport_code = #{airportCode} and user_id = #{employeeId}
